comments.body:
need to skip Python 2.7 for Windows since [grpcio skip it](https://github.com/conda-forge/grpcio-feedstock/blob/master/recipe/meta.yaml).
```suggestion
  skip: true  # [win and py27]
  script:
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  number: {{ build_number }}
  skip: true  # [win and py27]
  script:
    - python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed ./tensorflow_estimator-{{version}}-py2.py3-none-any.whl
